item.title: CVE-2023-47505|2024-08-02T21:09:37.234Z -- elementor.com -- elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Elementor.Com Elementor allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects Elementor: from n/a through 3.16.4.
